sub_title: Director of Development | Coach | People Management
summary:
Enthusiastic Director of Development with close to 20 years of experience in Agile software development involving distributed teams (Netherlands/India) including 8+ years experience as a ScrumMaster building/designing FMIS (Facility Management Information Systems), IWMS (Integrated Workplace Management Systems) and E-Commerce software.
Over the past 20 years I had nearly any job (Functional Designer, Developer, ScrumMaster, Product Owner, Development Manager) possible within a Development organization and because of that I know what is going on and needed in an environment where software is developed. I can easily related to many situation that people bump into as I experienced it myself.

My main focus is people, happiness, joy, balance and processes to keep everything in sync in our international Development department of 200+ colleagues.

Keywords:
* People Management
* Coaching
* Team builder
* Facilitator
* Multilingual teams
* Distributed teams
* Expert knowledge of Agile/Scrum methodologies
* Customer oriented
* Specification by Example
* Budgets

education.field_of_study: EQA geaccrediteerd door NOBCO & EMCC op practitionerniveau

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for managing several projects mostly related to mobile development. Keep an eye on the roadmaps, milestones and continuous improvement. The teams working on the projects are distributed (located partially in The Netherlands, Nijmegen and partially in India, Hyderabad).
 The new mobile platform of Planon, which is being developed right now, is one of those projects.
Next to the above I'm responsible for more than 20 colleagues as their People Manager. I coach them through their careers at Planon and be their first contact in case of personal situations, leave plans, project hurdles, etc.

Responsibilities:
* Make sure teams deliver projects in time, keep deadlines into account
* Make sure the status of projects are visible at all times
* Continuous improvement of department processes
* Coaching colleagues in their carreers
profile_positions.title: Manager Development

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for preparing and guiding multiple distributed teams (located partially in The Netherlands, Nijmegen and partially in India, Hyderabad) in their monthly sprints.
Grooming the backlog, specification workshops, writing specifications following the Specification By Example (SBE) way of working.

Next to this I've been a Project Manager for a project with our customer EMSD in Hong Kong. I was responsible for the mobile development part of the project.

Responsibilities:
* Writing specifications
* Discussing the roadmaps with the Product Managers
* Guiding the SCRUM/Kanban process
* Facilitating specification workshops (3-amigo-sessions)
* Delivering projects like:
   * Introducing the necesarry GDPR changes to the Planon Live suite
   * Attributes
   * Configuration sets
* Starting and guiding the project which develops the new mobile framework
* Project Manager for an important mobile project at EMSD in Hong Kong
profile_positions.title: Product Owner

profile_positions.company: Solvisoft | Let IT work for you
profile_positions.description:
Responsible for managing, preparing and (release) planning multiple projects at the same time. Each project differs in size (from a couple of hours to several months). Besides the previous I'm the gatekeeper for making sure the right software is delivered to our customers. Therefore, Product Owner is also part of the job.

The company is growing and with my previous working experience I'm implementing changes to professionalize the organization in terms of software development. Some examples:
* Incident Management (reported bugs, questions from customers)
* Planning projects
* Working according the OTAP principle
* Agile working methods
* Configuring Team Foundation Server 2017 (TFS)

Responsibilities:
* Define scope of new or running projects
* Planning of projects
* Communication toward customers
* Customer visits
* Writing User Stories
* Doing the final test before delivery
* Manage projects with Indian colleagues in Pune
* Implement changes to make the organization more professional
profile_positions.title: Project Manager E-Commerce

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for Scrum adoption in a multiple distributed team (located partially in The Netherlands, Nijmegen and partially in India, Hyderabad). The team focuses on Maintenance Management and a mobile multi-platform app called PMFS (Planon Mobile Field Services) in particular.

PMFS is currently one of the most popular products of Planon.

The team exists of 13 people, me included. The team is divided as follows:

Nijmegen, The Netherlands:
1 ScrumMaster
1 functional designer / Product Owner
2 developers
1 tester

Hyderabad, India
1 architect
4 developers
3 testers

Responsibilities:
* Release planing preparations, capacity prognosis
* Taking care of sprint planning
* Taking care of retrospectives
* Leading daily standups
* Solving impediments
* Teaching new colleagues on Scrum and how we do Scrum at Planon
* Project Manager of Cloud upgrades needed for PMFS. This involves multiple departments spread over several countries and third party companies
* Key person for PMFS between Planon and Movilizer GmbH
profile_positions.title: Certified ScrumMaster

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for Scrum adoption in multiple distributed teams (located partially in The Netherlands, Nijmegen and partially in India, Hyderabad). All roles of each team were present in both countries.
Besides being a ScrumMaster for multiple teams I partially did the coding myself.

Responsibilities:
* Taking care of sprint planning
* Taking care of retrospectives
* Organizing reviews
* Leading daily standups
* Solving impediments
* Teaching new colleagues on Scrum and how we do Scrum at Planon
* Coding new features and improvements for the product Planon ProCenter. Mainly to the domains Maintenance Management, Contract Management, Invoice Management and Project Management 
* Bug fixing for the product Planon ProCenter
profile_positions.title: Certified ScrumMaster / Agile Software Developer

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for designing and coding Planon Mobile; a product used by engineers for field services. The product was based on mForms, a product of Integral Mobile Data.

Responsibilities:
* Writing functional designs
* Writing technical designs
* Writing user manuals, installation manuals and other documentation
* Coding Planon Mobile in the mForms IDE
* Coding a configuration tool in Delphi which enables the application manager to customize the application to their needs both visual and functional
* Writing interfaces between customer systems and Planon ProCenter to enable Planon Mobile
* Troubleshooter for both national and international customers
profile_positions.title: Agile Software Developer

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for translating user requirements into clear functional designs. Based on these designs new modules and new features were implemented for Planon ProCenter Windows Client and Planon ProCenter Java Client.

Besides writing functional designs I managed CaliberRM for the whole department.

Responsibilities:
* Writing clear functional designs in collaboration with my manager based on the needs and requirements of (potential) customers
• Make sure new features or improvements are coded by design for upcoming and existing releases
• Writing Business Solutions for new features and improvements
• Writing functional designs especially regarding Real Estate related modules (Contract Management, Rental Management, Maintenance Management) to be coded for Planon ProCenter. Use cases, UML and OCL are part of these designs
* Functional knowledge transfer about new releases during training sessions in Dutch and English. Both national but also international locations attended as well as customers
* Project lead for several Release Candidates projects. The goal was adopting a new release and make the customer "go live"
* Second line support on customer problems and customer questions
* Application manager of CaliberRM which was used to store all requirements of the Research & Development department
profile_positions.title: Functional Designer

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the creation of a time writing tool used by the Research & Development department based on a in house developed J2EE framework. Besides taking care of the technical part I also took care of the functional designs.

Responsibilities:
* Interviewing end-users; what are the requirements and how should the application be used?
* Writing functional designs
* Writing technical designs
* Coding the application based on the new generation of Planon software (Planon Enterprise Edition) at that time. This platform was build on J2EE and Wicket and running on JBoss and TomCat
* Keeping manuals and other documentation up-to-date
profile_positions.title: Trainee Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for supervising a team of 25 to 30 employees and taking care of representation, planning and stock management.

Responsibilities:
* Direct responsible for the image of the biggest Albert Heijn supermarket of The Netherlands at the time, located in Nijmegen
* Training new employees
* Taking care of the daily planning
* Ensuring the end quality of each shift
profile_positions.title: Shift Supervisor

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for designing, coding and documenting a Cable Management system for one of the biggest telecom companies of The Netherlands at that time, KPN. Purpose of the system was to locate malfunctions easily in a graphical way. By visually connecting routers, switches, patch boxes, etc. the search for malfunctions could be reduced greatly by excluding non-relevant parts of the network.

Responsibilities:
* Coding a Cable Management system in Java by using J2EE running on a JBoss application server
* Desiging database schemes needed for the Cable Management application
* Writing user manuals, installation manuals and other documentation
profile_positions.title: Trainee Software Engineer
